title: Man's Best Friend: Linda Fontanilla & Beth Bradley
description:
This week, we have two stories about man’s best friend. This episode is hosted by The Moth’s Director of Marketing, Brandon Grant. To see the extras for this episode, head to our website: themoth.org/extras

Hosted by: Brandon Grant

Storytellers: Linda Fontanilla, Beth Bradley
itunes:subtitle: This week, we have two stories about man's best friend. Woof!
